entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow continues this evening and into early Sunday morning with a further 10 to 20 cm accumulating about higher parts of the road before midnight, with lesser amounts down to 700 metres. Easing to snow showers overnight with another 1 to 2 cm accumulating down to 400 metres Sunday morning.
